name: Shoot It! (Ali007_km)
description:
This is a short and quick game in which you begin by choosing the difficulty level. It is recommended that first-time players choose the easy option and work their way up.

CONTROL MOVEMENT:     A + D     OR       Right + Left SHOOT:     Right Click On Mouse      OR       Space HOW TO PLAY MOVEMENT:    To control the player, move left and right and avoid touching the balls. SHOOT:     To win, try firing the balls and clearing them all.
